content.description: Climb the short overhanging face using the two cracks angling up. Route seems very easy for the grade listed.
content.protection: Can set up top rope anchor above.  Trees/rocks to sling or set up a redirect.
content.location: Just upstream from the Dihedrals area and downstream from Humidor, there is a large and easy slab dihedral with a tree close to the edge.  Viva is the face parallel to the river with a small tree at its top just upstream from the dihedral.

content.description: Tricky face climb from bottom to top.  Thin flakes and have to trust the feet to get up.
content.protection: Static line or long webbing to reach trees/boulders at top for Top Rope.

content.description: Start 5 feet left of Center Dihedral. Climb the eaasy wall.
content.protection: TR: Tress and boulders on top

content.description: Start at the low angle dihedral to left on In-Turn. Climb crack and dihedral and finish up and right at the top.
content.protection: TR: Trees and boulders at top

content.description: Just to the left of Slick Willie. Climb the crack that turns into a corner above.
Climbs a dihedral to a roof.  Finish to right of roof.  Can also climb left slab face of dihedral to rejoin at roof.
content.protection: Natural (tree) anchors at top that can be set up easily with a static rope for TR.
content.location: Can reach by walking downriver from Sand Box or 3rd class downclimb just downstream of Sand Box.  Route is one corner upriver from the Slick Willie route.  Note that route or part of route may be underwater at high river levels.

content.description: Climb the downstream facing wall of the large dihedral.  Start from a small ledge and climb the face angling up and right.  Climb is easier if you climb closer to the arÃªte.
content.location: Same as for Viva but this climbs the downstream facing wall of the dihedral.

content.description: Start from the top of the crag and traverse the edge of the cliff upstream until it is possible to scramble down ledges to access the large flat ledge near water level at the basee of the routes.
Follow the crack that forks up the right wall of the dihedral from its midpoint.
Start at base of the dihedral in the middle of the crag. Climb the dihedral straight to the top.

Just downstream from the Sandbox.  Follow the descent for Sandbox but head to the right (downstream), rather than to the left.  There are two dihedrals near the water level.  Just a bit downstream from these are another few climbs and another larger dihedral.
